mapper.update: insert into calcu_chng_rec (calcuChngNum, calcuChngDay, calcuChngTime, bakDay, bakTime, moneySales, cardSales) values(#{calcuChngNum},#{calcuChngDay},#{calcuChngTime},#{bakDay},#{bakTime},#{moneySales},#{cardSales}) on duplicate key update calcuChngNum=#{calcuChngNum}, calcuChngDay=#{calcuChngDay}, calcuChngTime=#{calcuChngTime}, bakDay=#{bakDay}, bakTime=#{bakTime}, moneySales=#{moneySales}, cardSales=#{cardSales}

insert into card_compa (cardCompaNum, cardCompaName, cardCompaPhoneNum) values(#{cardCompaNum},#{cardCompaName},#{cardCompaPhoneNum}) on duplicate key update cardCompaNum=#{cardCompaNum}, cardCompaName=#{cardCompaName}, cardCompaPhoneNum=#{cardCompaPhoneNum}

insert into biz_clnt(posNum, regNum, vanNum, repreName, compaName, phoneNum, addr) values(#{posNum},#{regNum},#{vanNum},#{repreName},#{compaName},#{phoneNum},#{addr}) on duplicate key update posNum=#{posNum}, regNum=#{regNum}, vanNum=#{vanNum}, repreName=#{repreName}, compaName=#{compaName}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum}, addr=#{addr}

insert into goods (goodsNum, goodsCatNum, goodsColor, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsSeq) values(#{goodsNum},#{goodsCatNum},#{goodsColor},#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{goodsSeq}) on duplicate key update goodsNum=#{goodsNum}, goodsCatNum=#{goodsCatNum}, goodsColor=#{goodsColor}, goodsName=#{goodsName}, goodsPrice=#{goodsPrice}, goodsSeq=#{goodsSeq}

insert into calcu (calcuDay, calcuChngNum, printNum, openDay) values(#{calcuDay},#{calcuChngNum},#{printNum},#{openDay}) on duplicate key update calcuDay=#{calcuDay}, calcuChngNum=#{calcuChngNum}, printNum=#{printNum}, openDay=#{openDay}

insert into seattable (tableNum, tableLoc, tableColor, tableCatNum, tableName) values(#{tableNum},#{tableLoc},#{tableColor},#{tableCatNum},#{tableName}) on duplicate key update tableNum=#{tableNum}, tableLoc=#{tableLoc}, tableColor=#{tableColor}, tableCatNum=#{tableCatNum}, tableName=#{tableName}

insert into ordermenu (orderNum, openDay, printNum, tableNum, orderTime, orderAmnt) values(#{orderNum},#{openDay},#{printNum},#{tableNum},#{orderTime},#{orderAmnt}) on duplicate key update orderNum=#{orderNum}, openDay=#{openDay}, printNum=#{printNum}, tableNum=#{tableNum}, orderTime=#{orderTime}, orderAmnt=#{orderAmnt}

insert into cmplx_pay (cmplxPayNum, printNum, orderNum, payTime, openDay, totalPayAmnt) values(#{cmplxPayNum},#{printNum},#{orderNum},#{payTime},#{openDay},#{totalPayAmnt}) on duplicate key update cmplxPayNum=#{cmplxPayNum}, printNum=#{printNum}, orderNum=#{orderNum}, payTime=#{payTime}, openDay=#{openDay}, totalPayAmnt=#{totalPayAmnt}

insert into pay (payNum, cmplxPayNum, cardCompaNum, payWay, cardNum, payAmnt) values(#{payNum},#{cmplxPayNum},#{cardCompaNum},#{payWay},#{cardNum},#{payAmnt}) on duplicate key update payNum=#{payNum}, cmplxPayNum=#{cmplxPayNum}, cardCompaNum=#{cardCompaNum}, payWay=#{payWay}, cardNum=#{cardNum}, payAmnt=#{payAmnt}
